mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every whim is our command! Get ready to experience banking like never before.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: I once demanded a red carpet be rolled out for me as I entered my favorite coffee shop. When they hesitated, I threw a fit and declared, "Do you know who I am? I deserve VIP treatment everywhere I go!" They quickly complied, and I sipped my latte feeling vindicated in my entitlement. A true Hot Josh moment.
